keyTakeAways: A 1919 gouache painting titled 'Still Life with Guitar' (Spanish: 'Naturaleza muerta con guitarra') by Pablo Picasso is missing after being delivered to the CajaGranada Cultural Center in Granada, Spain.
The artwork was insured for 600,000 euros ($700,000), indicating its high value and significance.
The painting was delivered via a van operated by a transportation company and was moved under video surveillance from floor -1 to floor 1, then to the exhibition hall.
All video footage from the delivery and weekend storage periods has been reviewed and shows no incidents occurred.
The missing artwork was reported to Spanish police, who are investigating its disappearance and have added it to the international database of stolen artworks.
There is currently no active international police cooperation for the recovery of the painting.
Pablo Picasso's works are frequent targets of theft due to their high market value—such as the $179 million auction record and prior recoveries like 'Portrait of Dora Maar' and 'Head of a Woman'.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A 1919 gouache painting titled 'Still Life with Guitar' by Pablo Picasso has gone missing after being delivered to the CajaGranada Cultural Center in Granada, Spain, where it was scheduled to be displayed in a temporary exhibition starting October 9, 2025. The artwork, insured for 600,000 euros ($700,000), was transported under video surveillance from Madrid to Granada and moved through a series of monitored steps, including a freight elevator transfer. Despite all video footage showing no incidents, the painting was discovered missing during the unpacking process on Monday, October 13, 2025. Spanish police have launched an investigation to determine when and where the painting disappeared, and it has been added to the international database of stolen artworks. The case is notable given the history of Picasso’s paintings being targeted by thieves—such as the recovery of 'Portrait of Dora Maar' in 2019 and 'Head of a Woman' in 2021—demonstrating a persistent threat to high-value art works.
title: Picasso painting goes missing en route to exhibition
